problem.markdown:
Answer the following questions by using the charts you created. (Hint: Use the slicers)
>>In year 2014, which Manufacturer has the most sales for Youth Category?<< (x) Natura ( ) Aliqui ( ) VanArsdel ( ) Pomum
>>What is the percentage of that Manufacturer?<< ( ) 27.50% (x) 28.50% ( ) 29.50% ( ) 30.50%
problem.p: Answer the following questions by using the charts you created. (Hint: Use the slicers)
In year 2014, which Manufacturer has the most sales for Youth Category?
